review: We had visited the hospital and taken the consultation for my daughter. ****** *** **** *** ******** ********* *** **** ** ******* it was a nice experience. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. I am satisfied with explanation and treatment given by doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Medical tests were done like blood test, vitamin d test. My daughter had vitamin D, B12 deficiency, she is ok now and recovering. Diet was suggested, she told to have nutritious food like fruits and vegetables.

She is ****** *************, humble, very  keen in observation, fast grasping the subject and a good human being.

She will not write the medicine unnecessarily like other doctors.  Her medicines are apt for the respective diseases. 

She is also doing lot of research in Peadiatric 

I wish her and her family all the best.
